Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: My opinion is that this section of the code is rough and still needs work before the functionality is expanded.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: See my comments on the other submission. If this code doesn't have a maintainer and it's not broken then it shouldn't be changed.

Author: Quentin Glidic
Comment:
This code is not changed, but you consider it broken any way.
As long as this code exists, it should handle the whole thing, not a subset.

If the click events are considered WIP, then they should either be moved to another branch or removed, but that shouldn’t prevent bringing the full feature to users.

If something needs change, just do it in another commit please…

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I definitely agree with Quentin here — he is just moving code around, so it’s not on him to fix any issues with the code.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: This is not just moving code around. The early return changes the control flow and alters the functionality of clicks on the bar.
